dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4710 IH: Publish Overdose and Suicide Tracking For American Safety Today Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Green of Tennessee (for himself, Mr. Norman, and Mr. D'Esposito) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To require the Director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to accelerate the collection and publication of data on suicide and drug overdoses.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Publish Overdose and Suicide Tracking For American Safety Today Act of 2023 or the POST FAST Act of 2023.

section.header: Accelerated collection and publication of data on suicide and drug overdoses
section.text: The Director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention shallâ€”

paragraph.text: take such actions as may be necessary to accelerate the collection by the Centers of data on suicide and drug overdoses in the United States; and
not later than 60 days after the end of each month, publish such data for such month.
